artist: Artist: Charles Rennie Mackintosh; Artist: Margaret Macdonald Mackintosh
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: rectangular multistory building; one peak at far left; section with antenna on top next; multisegmented windows in various sizes; green tree-like objects with round heads along right front and above stairway on left; below image: "C.R. MACKINTOSH. GLASGOW. HAUS EINES KUNST-FREUNDS/ VERLAGS-ANSTALT:ALEXANDER KOCH-DARMSTADT.-TAFEL III." title above image; number 3" at right; publisher's name, "NORD" and scale below image
portfolio: From Meister der Innen: Kunst II: Charles Rennie Mackintosh Haus Eines Kunstfreundes
title: Plate 3, from "Meister der Innen: Kunst II: Charles Rennie Mackinstosh Haus Eines Kunstfreundes (House for an Art Lover)"
